name: PKPaymentAuthorizationResult
desc: An object that reports the status code and errors for a payment authorization request.

items.name: init(status: PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, errors: [Error]?)
items.desc: Initialize the result with the status code and list of errors.

items.name: var errors: [Error]!
items.desc: List of errors in the Apple Pay sheet.

items.name: enum PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: General success and failure status for payment authorization.
